Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-24795 affecting package rubygem-yajl-ruby for versions less than 1.3.1-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-24795 affecting package rubygem-yajl-ruby for versions less than 1.3.1-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package rubygem-yajl-ruby is earlier than 1.3.1-2, affected by CVE-2022-24795
